entry.title: BIP 0021 idea: sendmany
entry.summary: The given context is brief and lacks sufficient information to generate a summary. It only mentions "Multiple recipients/amounts" and suggests any syntax can be used. However, there are no details about what the recipients or amounts are for. Moreover, the context refers to an HTML attachment that has been scrubbed, so it is unclear what the attachment contained. Without further information, it is not possible to provide a detailed summary.
